lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Tomorrow, Brazil was due to fulfill payment of 15 billion dollars in short range credit lines, but its economic officials have suggested a 60-day extension in the deadline in order to seek a renegotiation with its creditors.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sarney's decision means that Brazilian importers of machinery and industrial equipment can buy dollar currency in the parallel market without having to wait for the issuing of an official order from the Banco do Brasil's Foreign Trade Department (Cacex).

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sarney also announced measures to boost exports in an effort to strengthen the country's trade balance and alleviate the risk of a reduction of foreign loans for this sector of the economy.
